about.title: About Bozorgi Group
about.description: Since 1988, Bozorgi Group has operated under the motto "Business Without Boundaries." We have evolved into a multi-faceted conglomerate specializing in Building Materials, Property Consulting, and IT Solutions.
about.missionText: To supply superior building materials, expert property advice, and cutting-edge IT solutions with unmatched service and integrity.
about.visionText: To lead globally across our three pillars of business by upholding our core values of honesty, transparency, and operational excellence.
about.valuesText: Honesty, loyalty, clarity, and continuous learning. We prioritize humanity and mutual benefit, fostering transparent relationships with all our partners.

products.title: Building Materials Portfolio
products.subtitle: Premium engineered and natural wood solutions tailored for construction excellence.
products.mdf.name: MDF
products.mdf.description: Versatile engineered wood offering a smooth surface ideal for painting, precision machining, and high-end furniture.
products.hdf.name: HDF
products.hdf.description: High-density fiberboard delivering superior durability and strength for flooring and demanding structural applications.
products.plywood.name: Plywood
products.plywood.description: Strong, stable, and impact-resistant engineered wood perfect for structural integrity in construction and design.
products.hardwood.name: Hardwood
products.hardwood.description: Premium natural timber sourced from broad-leaved forests, renowned for its exceptional durability and aesthetic grain.
products.chipboard.name: Chipboard
products.chipboard.description: Cost-effective and versatile sheets widely used in furniture manufacturing, cabinetry, and building interiors.
products.hpl.name: HPL
products.hpl.description: Durable High-Pressure Laminates designed for resilient, scratch-resistant surfaces and modern architectural finishes.
products.veneer.name: Natural Veneer
products.veneer.description: Exquisitas láminas de madera natural que añaden un acabado de madera auténtico y premium a interiores, puertas y gabinetes.
history.title: Our Legacy: A Family Tree
history.subtitle: A journey through generations of leadership and innovation in the timber and building materials industry.
family.gen5.name: Bozorg Bozorgi
family.gen5.description: Founder of the original timber business, laying the groundwork for generations to come.
family.gen4.name: Aliasghar Bozorgi
family.gen4.description: Started and grew the local hometown business with timber, expanding on his father's legacy.
family.gen3.name: Muhammadali Bozorgi
family.gen3.description: He significantly expanded the local business, increasing its reach and reputation.
family.gen2.name: Ali Bozorgi
family.gen2.title: 1988 - Present
family.gen2.description: CEO at BBMTCo. A revolutionary leader who introduced global trading with hi-tech materials.
family.gen1.name: Aliasghar Bozorgi
family.gen1.title: 2001 - Present
family.gen1.description: From partner at BBMTCo to leading Bozorgi Group from 2020, continuing the family's innovative spirit.
humanity.title: Humanity First!
humanity.subtitle: We believe in sharing our success with the community.
humanity.hospitalText: We proudly support the Organ Transplantation Center at Abu Ali Sina Hospital, aiding their critical mission to save lives.
humanity.schoolText: Founded in 1996 in Shiraz by Bozorgi Group, this high school is a testament to our commitment to education and empowering the next generation.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to optimize your supply chain? Connect with our global team today.

chatbox.cannedResponse: Thank you for your message. A representative will be with you shortly.
theme.title: Theme
whyus.title: Why Choose Bozorgi Group — Wood Consulting Experts
whyus.subtitle: In the world of wood, experience matters most — and we’ve built ours through years of real, hands-on work in global markets.
whyus.desc1: Bozorgi Group is a specialized wood consulting and sourcing firm, offering deep expertise in wood and wood-based materials — from sourcing and importing to selecting the right materials for industrial and architectural projects.
whyus.desc2: Our consulting services are grounded in market reality and proven field experience — not theory.
whyus.list1: Choose the right type of wood based on your needs, budget, and purpose.
whyus.list2: Avoid costly mistakes in purchasing or project execution.
whyus.list3: Gain access to trusted global suppliers and high-quality raw materials.
whyus.list4: Make confident technical and business decisions with professional guidance.
whyus.conclusion: With long-term experience across Spain, the Middle East, and Europe, we bring a broad vision and solid network to every project. At Bozorgi Group, we are not just suppliers — we are your trusted wood consultants and strategic partners in every step of the decision-making process.
property.title: Property Consulting
property.subtitle: We consult you to know exactly when, where, and how to invest in real estate.
property.when.title: When
property.when.desc: Expert analysis on market cycles to time your purchase, sale, or lease perfectly.
property.where.title: Where
property.where.desc: Identifying the best locations with the highest potential for growth and ROI.
property.what.title: Buy, Sell, or Rent
property.what.desc: Strategic advice on whether to buy, sell, or rent properties based on your goals.
property.who.title: Who
property.who.desc: Connecting you with trusted partners, agents, and stakeholders you can rely on.
property.strategy.title: Our Strategic Approach
property.strategy.desc: We don't just find properties; we analyze markets. Our deep understanding of local regulations in the Middle East and Europe allows us to guide you through complex transactions with ease, ensuring your investment is secure and profitable.
property.private.title: Investment in Dubai, Without Hidden Risks
property.private.subtitle: We work for those for whom a 3 to 30 million dirham deal is just one line in their portfolio, but that one line should not create trouble.
property.private.list1: Direct access to off-market deals and exclusive pre-sales.
property.private.list2: Complete legal & tax analysis by a dedicated lawyer and accountant.
property.private.list3: Weekly reports on project status until the day of handover.
property.private.list4: Option to purchase via a company or trust, ensuring anonymity.
property.private.stat.desc: Of our clients in the last 12 months have worked with us again or came from referrals. The number speaks for itself.
materials.consulting.title: Consulting Methodology
materials.consulting.subtitle: A comprehensive four-step framework to ensure your project's success.
materials.what.title: What to Choose
materials.what.desc: We identify the exact wood species, grade, and specifications that perfectly match your project's technical and aesthetic requirements.
materials.when.title: When to Buy
materials.when.desc: We navigate global market fluctuations to help you time your purchases for optimal pricing and on-time delivery.
materials.where.title: Where to Source
materials.where.desc: Leveraging our network in Europe, America, and Asia, we select the best origin for your materials to balance quality and logistics.
materials.how.title: How to Use
materials.how.desc: Technical guidance on application, treatment, and maintenance to ensure maximum durability and performance.
testimonials.title: Client Success Stories
testimonials.materials.subtitle: Trusted by construction leaders and architects worldwide.
testimonials.materials.quote1: Bozorgi Group's expertise in wood sourcing saved us significant time and budget on our latest hotel project. The quality was impeccable.
testimonials.materials.quote2: Their consulting on when to buy bulk materials helped us avoid the 2023 price surge. True strategic partners.
testimonials.materials.quote3: Reliable, transparent, and incredibly knowledgeable about global timber markets.
testimonials.property.subtitle: Guiding investors to profitable real estate opportunities.
testimonials.property.quote1: Their market analysis for our Dubai investment was spot on. We achieved a 12% ROI in the first year alone.
testimonials.property.quote2: Navigating the legal landscape in a new country is hard. Bozorgi Group made it effortless for our family relocation.
testimonials.property.quote3: Professional advice on commercial leasing that aligned perfectly with our business expansion goals.
testimonials.it.subtitle: What successful businesses say about our automation.
testimonials.it.quote1: By using this system, our sales tripled and customer follow-up time was reduced to a quarter. Truly amazing!
testimonials.it.quote2: The Ad Automation allowed us to manage our budget better and our conversion rate went up 10x. Highly recommended!
testimonials.it.quote3: They have an amazing support team. The system is very user-friendly and needs no technical knowledge. Excellent!
